info.title: Lanonasis MCP REST API
info.description:
Complete REST API for Lanonasis Memory as a Service (MaaS) platform.
Provides access to 28 MCP tools through a consistent `/api/v1/**` interface.

## Tool Categories
- **Memory Management** (8 tools): CRUD operations, search, stats, bulk delete, chunked create
- **API Key Management** (5 tools): Create, list, delete, rotate, revoke
- **Intelligence** (6 tools): Tag suggestions, related memories, duplicates, insights, patterns
- **Projects & Organizations** (3 tools): Project and org management
- **System** (5 tools): Health, auth status, config, docs search

## Authentication

This API supports three authentication methods:

1. **OAuth2 PKCE** (Primary)
   - Authorization URL: `https://auth.lanonasis.com/oauth/authorize`
   - Token URL: `https://auth.lanonasis.com/oauth/token`
   - Scopes: `mcp:full`, `memories:read`, `memories:write`, `profile`

2. **API Key** (Fallback)
   - Header: `X-API-Key: lms_live_*`

3. **JWT Token** (Legacy)
   - Header: `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>`
